favourite.article: This is one of Charles Wesley's very meaningful prayerful hymns sung to the very apt tune of Vienna.
Please can I get the meaning or the reason as well as the mystery behind the hymn 'CHRIST FROM ALL BLESSING FLOW. It is true that all blessing flows from the mediator of the new covenant.

Who Thy mystic body are... Remembering who we are in Christ throughout the day will be required of all those who will overcome sin, the flesh, and the devil to glorify God on the earth. To be one with Him, in His mystic body where no sin abides. What a glorious thought. I love this song!
